item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, August 31, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Zelenskyy sacks air force chief after top pilot killed in F-16 crash
2. Economist Eugene Fama: ‘Efficient markets is a hypothesis. It’s not reality’
3. Harris pitches for centre in first big TV interview as candidate
4. Sotheby’s earnings plunge as art market catches a chill
5. [Opinion] How to stay happy when you have lost a fortune
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, August 31, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
